title: Simplify process to add new connection properties
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
It is fairly complicated to add a new ConnectionInfo property. The implementer must remember to update:
- The `AbstractConnectionInfo` class
- The `ConnectionInfoInheritance` class
- All serializers/deserializers
- For the database serializers/deserializers, should this property be saved to the DB (shared property) or locally (personal property)?
   - If personal, don't add the property to the normal database serializer. Instead update 4 completely different locations to have the property h...
